title: Himi 167
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
’Eiki ko e Kapiteni
‘O e tau ‘o ‘Isileli,
Pea mo e Takimu’a
Ki he kakai fai fononga,
Ke nau ma’u ‘a e fonua,
Kuo tuku ‘i ‘olunga.
2.
’Eiki ‘oku mau nonofo
‘I he malu lelei ‘o’ou,
Ko e ‘ao ‘o e ‘ofa,
‘O e pule angatonu,
Ko homau mālohi’anga,
‘Eiki ko ho’o anga’ofa.
3.
Pea ko ho ‘o folofola,
‘Oku mau fie fai ki ai,
Pea ko e ngata’anga,
Ko e fakaongolelei,
‘Eiki ‘a e ‘Afiona,
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē.
4.
’I he taki kimautolu,
‘E ho Laumālie lelei,
‘E ‘ikai te mau ‘alu hē
‘I he hala toafa ni,
‘E ‘ikai te mau masiva,
‘I he fakahinohino.
5.
‘E kau lelei ‘a e ‘ofa,
‘A e ‘Afiona, ‘Eiki,
Pea ‘e mama’o atu
‘A e ngaahi tu’utāmaki,
‘I he ofi ‘a e ‘ofa
‘A e ‘Eiki taupotu. *
